item.title: Help
item.description: hugo --help hugo is the main command, used to build your Hugo site. Hugo is a Fast and Flexible Static Site Generator built with love by spf13 and friends in Go. Complete documentation is available at http://gohugo.io/. Usage: hugo [flags] hugo [command] Available Commands: config Print the site configuration convert Convert your content to different formats deploy Deploy your site to a Cloud provider. env Print Hugo version and environment info gen A collection of several useful generators.
